text:
## Enable two-factor authentication

With two-factor authentication (2FA) enabled, a one-time code will be sent to
the users for the identity and access verification in addition to their user
credentials. You can choose whether to enable the verification via SMS.

vec_docs:
## Enable two-factor authentication

With two-factor authentication (2FA) enabled, a one-time code will be sent to
the users for the identity and access verification in addition to their user
credentials. You can choose whether to enable the verification via SMS.
